product_name: SPRI Flat Band Loop - Medium Resistance
long_description: This wide closed-loop resistance band is designed to fit comfortably around the upper or lower legs, offering medium resistance during mobility, flexibility and strength exercises for hips and knees.
short_description: This wide closed-loop resistance band is designed to fit comfortably around the upper or lower legs, offering medium resistance during mobility, flexibility and strength exercises for hips and knees.
